scripts.build:css: node-sass Resources/Private/Styles/OutdatedBrowser.scss Resources/Public/Main.css && cssnano Resources/Public/Main.css Resources/Public/Main.css --autoprefixer.add true --autoprefixer.browsers: '> 1%' --no-zindex --discardComments.removeAll true
scripts.compress:zopfli: rm Resources/Public/Main.js.gz 2> /dev/null && rm Resources/Public/Main.css.gz 2> /dev/null; zopfli Resources/Public/Main.js && zopfli Resources/Public/Main.css
scripts.compress:brotli: rm Resources/Public/Main.js.br 2> /dev/null && rm Resources/Public/Main.css.br 2> /dev/null; brotli Resources/Public/Main.js && brotli Resources/Public/Main.css
scripts.compress: npm run compress:zopfli && npm run compress:brotli
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js;npm run compress
